Class Club

java.lang.Object
club.model.Club
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventObserver
public class Club extends Object implements EventObserver
Represents a club with members, admins, events, and announcements. Coordinates the various management systems.

      public void updateEvent(Event event)
      Updates an existing event in the club using the event manager.
      Parameters:
      event - The updated event
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the event is null or not found

    • removeAnnouncement

      public boolean removeAnnouncement(Announcement announcement)
      Removes an announcement from the club.
      Parameters:
      announcement - The announcement to remove
      Returns:
      true if the announcement was found and removed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the announcement is null

    • registerNewMember

      public String registerNewMember(Member newMember)
      Registers a new member to the club using the membership manager.
      Parameters:
      newMember - The member to add.
      Returns:
      The assigned membership ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the member is null.

    • validateMemberLogin

      public Member validateMemberLogin(String email, String password)
      Validates a member's login credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - The member's email.
      password - The member's password.
      Returns:
      The member if credentials are valid and the account is active, otherwise null.

    • onEventUpdate

      public void onEventUpdate(Event event, EventAction action)
      Implementation of the EventObserver interface. Creates announcements automatically when events are created or cancelled.
      Specified by:
      onEventUpdate in interface EventObserver
      Parameters:
      event - The event that was changed
      action - The action that occurred
